name: Red Plaid Ruffle Bib Front Tunic
description:
Red plaid tunic.  Ruffle bib-front.  Sash tie at the waist.  Button-front closure.  Sleeves elastic at the ends for better fit. 

Small  (measured while lying flat): 
31 inches from shoulder to hem 
16 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 18 inches 
waist 14 inches; can be nipped in by the sash tie 
hip 18 inches

100% polyester

name: Black Floral Satin Party Dress
description:
Black and blue strapless satin dress.  Beautiful floral print reminds us of a vintage scarf.  Black sash tie at back waist.  Bust lined.

Small (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  25 inches from armpit to hem 
BUST ACROSS:  unstretched, 13 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 17 inches 
WAIST:  unstretched 12 inches; stretches to 15 inches

100% polyester

name: Rose Floral Print Brown Dress
description:
Spaghetti straps.  Elastic at back of bust and waist (where bodice and bottom is seamed) for better fit.  Dainty ribbon ties at the back.  Detailed with pockets.  Its color is in between brick and brown.     

Medium (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  33 inches from shoulder to hem 
BUST ACROSS:  unstretched, 14 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 19 inches 
WAIST:  where the seaming is between the bodice and the skirt/bottom, unstretched 12 inches; stretches to 18 inches

Large (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  33 inches from shoulder to hem 
BUST ACROSS: unstretched, 14 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 20 inches 
WAIST: where the seaming is between the bodice and the skirt/bottom, unstretched 13 inches; stretches to 19 inches

100% cotton

name: Black and Floral Print Tiered Dress
description:
Punchy and bright, this urban-living-meets-country patchwork dress is a show stopper.  Taking inspiration from patchwork of old and infusing it with animal prints and lively florals updates the look for now.

Small (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  31 inches from shoulder to hem 
BUST ACROSS: unstretched, 12 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 17 inches 
EMPIRE WAIST: nstretched, 11 inches; stretches to 16 inches

Medium (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  33 inches from shoulder to hem 
BUST ACROSS: unstretched, 13 inches from armpit to armpit; stretches to 20 inches 
EMPIRE WAIST:  unstretched, 13 inches; stretches to 18 inches

100% rayon

name: Green and Floral Print Vintage Inspired Dress
description:
This dress has it all with its lush texture and palette. Green mesh on top accent with pleated ruffles. Vintage-inspired floral print.  Bubble hem.  High waist.  Fully lined. Side zipper closure. 100% cotton.   

Medium (measured while lying flat): 
LENGTH:  33 inches shoulder to hem 
BUST ACROSS:  approximately 18 inches from armpit to armpit 
HIGH WAIST:  15 inches; no room for stretch

100% cotton
